abstract: Under British takeover rules, AMS has until July 24 to make a firm offer for Dialog Semiconductor, which is based in London and listed in Frankfurt. The combined company would have a market capitalization of nearly $5 billion.
snippet: Under British takeover rules, AMS has until July 24 to make a firm offer for Dialog Semiconductor, which is based in London and listed in Frankfurt. The combined company would have a market capitalization of nearly $5 billion.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – The Austrian semiconductor company AMS confirmed on Thursday that it was in preliminary talks about a “possible merger of equals” with the London-based Dialog Semiconductor.

headline.main: Semiconductor Makers AMS and Dialog in Early Talks
